Image2Characters.filterImage.FilterImage¶

class Image2Characters.filterImage.FilterImage(npImage=None)[source]¶

Routines to make image more suitable for area recognition self.filtered has the image after subsequent operations to test: python3 filterImage.py file.jpg

__init__(npImage=None)[source]¶

image can be read in as numpy array

Methods
